entry.title: GeForce RTX 40 Series & DLSS 3 | Developer Impressions

media:group.media:title: GeForce RTX 40 Series & DLSS 3 | Developer Impressions
media:group.media:description:
A new era of graphical performance and fidelity is here. Watch the developers behind Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered, Cyberpunk 2077, and Warhammer 40,000: Darktide share how GeForce RTX 40 Series and new NVIDIA RTX technologies like DLSS 3 deliver a quantum leap in performance and AI-powered graphics.
Featured Developers: Jurjen Katsman, CEO & Co-Founder, Nixxes Rikard Blomberg, CTO & Co-Founder, Fatshark Jakub Knapik, Global Art Director, CD PROJECKT RED Przemek Czatrowski, Code Rendering Acting Lead, CD PROJEKT RED
Learn More About GeForce RTX 40 Series: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/graphics-cards/40-series/
Learn More About DLSS 3: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/technologies/dlss/

entry.title: Tower of Fantasy | RTX Gameplay Reveal

media:group.media:title: Tower of Fantasy | RTX Gameplay Reveal
media:group.media:description:
Embark on your fantasy adventure in the open-world action MMORPG, Tower of Fantasy, enhanced with NVIDIA DLSS 2 and ray tracing - coming soon - delivering beautiful visuals & incredible performance.
In Tower of Fantasy, dwindling resources and a lack of energy have forced mankind to leave earth and migrate to Aida, a lush and habitable alien world. There, they observed the comet Mara and discovered an unknown but powerful energy called "Omnium". Tower of Fantasy was built to capture Mara and harness “Omnium”, but an uncontrolled energy from “Omnium” led to a catastrophic disaster on their new homeworld.
Learn More About Tower of Fantasy: https://www.toweroffantasy-global.com/ Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan regions: https://www.hotta.com.tw/ Korea: https://tof.pwrd.co.kr
Subscribe to GeForce! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL-g3eGJi1omSDSz48AML-g

entry.title: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Launch Trailer

media:group.media:title: A Plague Tale: Requiem - Launch Trailer
media:group.media:description:
A Plague Tale: Requiem, the direct sequel to the critically acclaimed and award-winning A Plague Tale: Innocence, has finally arrived.
Players can embark on a breathtaking adventure, reuniting fans of the series with Amicia and Hugo De Rune and welcoming new players into the brutal medieval world of the game. Watch the launch trailer for a glimpse of the emotional and visually stunning journey available now.
The heartrending story of Amicia and Hugo De Rune continues. Embark on their next journey and venture south of 14th century France before setting sail to a mysterious island out in the Mediterranean Sea. Brave a terrible fate, looking for the cure to heal Hugo’s illness, and discover the cost of saving those you love in a desperate struggle for survival within a dark, plague-ridden medieval world twisted by otherworldly forces.
This new chapter stays true to the series’ defining sense of history and strong narrative direction and expands gameplay possibilities, granting extra freedom to players within a more open environment. Choose to strike from the shadow or to unleash hell, turning to Amicia’s new resources—including the use of alchemy to manipulate fire and the long-distance power of a crossbow, but also her cunning use of terrain and ability to wrestle out of an enemy’s grasp.
Designed for long-time fans and newcomers alike, this next-gen exclusive production brings a whole new level of realism and immersion, delivering a sublime visual experience through the bright new Mediterranean setting and the characteristic contrast between light and dark of the series.
A Plague Tale: Requiem is now available on PC and on NVIDIA GeForce Now.
Get the game now:https://www.focus-entmt.com/en/games/a-plague-tale-requiem
Subscribe to GeForce! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL-g3eGJi1omSDSz48AML-g
GeForce Twitter: https://twitter.com/NVIDIAGeForce GeForce Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NVIDIAGeForce/ GeForce Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nvidiageforce/ GeForce Community Portal: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/community-portal/

entry.title: NVIDIA DLSS 3 | Multiplying performance with AI

media:group.media:title: NVIDIA DLSS 3 | Multiplying performance with AI
media:group.media:description:
With NVIDIA DLSS 3, Optical Multi Frame Generation, Super Resolution, and NVIDIA Reflex come together to multiply performance with great image quality and responsiveness. See what reviewers think of the newest breakthrough in AI-powered graphics.
Learn More about DLSS 3: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/technologies/dlss/
DLSS 3 is backwards compatible with DLSS 2, and over 35 games and applications are already integrating the technology, with the first titles available now.

entry.title: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales - PC Features Trailer I PC Games

media:group.media:title: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales - PC Features Trailer I PC Games
media:group.media:description:
Marvel’s Spider-Man: Miles Morales is going RTX On November 18th with a suite of PC features including NVIDIA DLSS 3, DLAA, Reflex, and more.
After the events of Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered, teenage Miles Morales is adjusting to his new home while following in the footsteps of his mentor, Peter Parker, as a new Spider-Man. When a fierce power struggle threatens to destroy his home, Miles must take up the mantle of Spider-Man and own it.
PC Optimized Graphics Enjoy a variety of graphics quality options to tailor to a wide range of devices, unlocked framerates, and support for other technologies including performance boosting NVIDIA DLSS 3 and NVIDIA DLSS 2, image quality enhancing NVIDIA DLAA, and latency-reducing NVIDIA Reflex.
Ray-traced reflections and shadows* See the city come to life with stunning ray-traced reflection and ray-traced shadow options with a variety of quality modes to choose from.
Ultra-wide Monitor support** Take in the cinematic sights of Marvel’s New York with support for a range of screen setups, including 16:9, 16:10, 21:9, 32:9, and 48:9 resolutions. 48:9 resolutions with triple monitor setups are compatible with NVIDIA Surround.
Controls and Customization Feel what it’s like to play as Spider-Man through immersive haptic feedback and dynamic trigger effects using a PlayStation DualSense™ controller on a wired USB connection. Enjoy full mouse and keyboard support with various customizable control options.
*Compatible PC required **Compatible PC and display device required
Pre-Purchase Now to unlock early game content; • T.R.A.C.K. Suit • Into the Spider-Verse Suit • Gravity Well gadget • Three Skill Points
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1817190/Marvels_SpiderMan_Miles_Morales/ Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/p/marvels-spider-man-miles-morales
Subscribe to GeForce! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL-g3eGJi1omSDSz48AML-g
GeForce Twitter: https://twitter.com/NVIDIAGeForce GeForce Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NVIDIAGeForce/ GeForce Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nvidiageforce/ GeForce Community Portal: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/community-portal/

media:group.media:title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide | Closed Beta Test - Welcome to Tertium
media:group.media:description:
There's still a chance to get into the Closed Beta this weekend, read more here: https://bit.ly/3Te71Mx NVIDIA ray tracing, DLSS 3, and Reflex are coming soon to Warhammer 40,000: Darktide.
Learn more about Warhammer 40,000: Darktide with RTX:: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/news/warhammer-40k-darktide-dlss-reflex-ray-tracing/
In advance of Warhammer 40,000: Darktide’s November 30th launch, NVIDIA and Fatshark have formed a partnership to deliver the definitive experience to GeForce RTX gamers, enhancing their co-op adventures with NVIDIA DLSS 3, NVIDIA Reflex, and advanced ray tracing effects. In other words, you’ll receive the highest levels of performance, the smoothest gameplay, and the highest-fidelity graphics.

entry.title: GeForce RTX 4090 – The Reviews Are In!

media:group.media:title: GeForce RTX 4090 – The Reviews Are In!
media:group.media:description:
Reviewers share their praise for the GeForce RTX 4090 graphics card. Learn more: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/graphics-cards/40-series/rtx-4090/
The GeForce RTX 4090 is the ultimate GeForce GPU delivering an enormous leap in performance, efficiency, and AI-powered graphics.
Experience ultra-high performance gaming, incredibly detailed virtual worlds with ray tracing, unprecedented productivity, and new ways to create. It’s powered by the NVIDIA Ada Lovelace architecture and comes with 24 GB of G6X memory to deliver the ultimate experience for gamers and creators.

media:group.media:title: F1® 22 | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 3 Comparison
media:group.media:description:
Experience EA SPORTS F1® 22 with ray tracing and NVIDIA DLSS 3, boosting performance by up to 2.5X. https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/news/october-2022-rtx-dlss-game-updates Take your seat in the new era of Formula 1® with EA Sports F1®22 and get the definitive PC experience with a suite of high-fidelity ray tracing effects and NVIDIA DLSS 3. Featuring an extensive update to virtually every system to accommodate the new rules and aerodynamics, F1®22 enables fans to take virtual control of the drivers from all 10 teams, or drop in as themselves, to see if they can best the likes of Max Verstappen, Lewis Hamilton, and Charles Leclerc. Learn More About EA SPORTS F1® 22: https://www.ea.com/games/f1/f1-22

entry.title: What is NVIDIA DLSS 3? | The Performance Multiplier

media:group.media:title: What is NVIDIA DLSS 3? | The Performance Multiplier
media:group.media:description:
Learn how NVIDIA is applying DLSS 3: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/technologies/dlss/
Bryan Catanzaro of the NVIDIA Applied Deep Learning Research team talks through NVIDIA DLSS 3 - the latest breakthrough in AI-powered graphics that multiplies performance for games and apps. Learn more about the three unique pieces of technology that make up DLSS 3: Optical Multi Frame Generation (all-new), Super Resolution, and NVIDIA Reflex.
DLSS 3 is backwards compatible with DLSS 2, and over 35 games and applications are already integrating the technology, with the first launching in October 2022.
Subscribe to GeForce! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL-g3eGJi1omSDSz48AML-g?sub_confirmation=1 GeForce Twitter: https://twitter.com/NVIDIAGeForce GeForce Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NVIDIAGeForce/ GeForce Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nvidiageforce/

entry.title: Dakar Desert Rally | 4K NVIDIA DLSS Comparison

media:group.media:title: Dakar Desert Rally | 4K NVIDIA DLSS Comparison
media:group.media:description:
Experience the speed and excitement of the largest rally race on the planet in Dakar Desert Rally, enhanced with NVIDIA DLSS 2 for maximum performance.
Dakar Desert Rally is the biggest and most epic off-road rally racing adventure ever developed. Dakar Desert Rally captures the genuine speed and excitement of Amaury Sport Organisation’s largest rally race on the planet, featuring a wide variety of licensed vehicles from the world’s top makers, including motorcycles, cars, trucks, quads and SSVs. The game offers unique challenges for off-road simulation diehards and casual racing fans alike. Compete in fierce online multiplayer races or navigate the vast wilds in single-player offline.
Learn more about Dakar Desert Rally: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1839940/Dakar_Desert_Rally/

entry.title: Sackboy: A Big Adventure - PC Features Trailer

media:group.media:title: Sackboy: A Big Adventure - PC Features Trailer
media:group.media:description:
Sackboy: A Big Adventure is coming to PC on October 27 with ray tracing and NVIDIA DLSS 2.
Iconic PlayStation® hero Sackboy bursts into breathtaking action on PC with a huge, fun and frantic 3D multiplayer platforming adventure. The dastardly Vex (a near-mythical being born of chaos and fear, no less) kidnaps Sackboy’s friends and forces them to build his Topsy Turver. This most terrifyingly twisted device will transform Craftworld from a fantastical land of pure imagination and innocent dreams… into a torrid, barren eyesore of nightmares. Ooh the fiend! But legend tells of a prophecy from deep within the ancient order of the Knitted Knights, Craftworld’s legendary protectors. For only the brave, fearless, chivalrous and, yes, gallant can save the day in an almost too dramatic for words race against time stuffed with danger and peril. So much peril. Set off alone or with your bravest friends on a whirlwind of capers across the snowiest mountains, the leafiest jungles, the wettest underwater realms and the, uh, spaciest of space colonies. Take down Vex. Save the sack-folk. Save the day. It’s time to fulfil your destiny, Sackboy. From woolly wonderkid and hessian hero… rise our Knitted Knight.
Subscribe to GeForce! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL-g3eGJi1omSDSz48AML-g
GeForce Twitter: https://twitter.com/NVIDIAGeForce GeForce Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NVIDIAGeForce/ GeForce Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nvidiageforce/ GeForce Community Portal: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/community-portal/
